changelog:
- May Google Security patches (Android-9.0_r37)
- Added Google Sound Search tile
- Added Q style lockscreen text clock
- Added customisable alignment for Q style clock
- Added Q style battery icon toggle
- Introduce LiveDisplay from Lineage
- Added LiveDisplay tile
- Added reading mode tile
- Introduce Smart Charging
- Statusbar: Clock size & font style
- Launcher3: SystemShortcut: Add uninstall option
- Updated and fixed RU translations 
- Added Aggressive Idle feature
- EdgeGestures: fix unregistering input filter
- Fixed phone FC on some devices
- Add back dirac
- Other fixes and system optimizations

ONLY 9.4.25 FW
